channel.title: Comments on: Rick Segal and Shel Israel to visit Ireland

item.title: By: John Ward
item.dc:creator: John Ward
item.description:
Hi, I contacted Mary yesterday to attend this event.
Unfortunately Rick & Shel have to postpone their trip. The rescheduled date is not yet known.
John
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I contacted Mary yesterday to attend this event.

Unfortunately Rick & Shel have to postpone their trip. The rescheduled date is not yet known.

John
